summary.description:

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern and near calm conditions. Showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
